semantic_analysis:
Please review this book manuscript. 
    1. Outline the semantic structure of the book as best you can. A typical semantic structure is Parts > {Front Matter, Body, Back Matter} => {Foreword, Chapters, Indexes} => {Scenes, Content}. Always go to scene level. Very concisely (10 words or less) identify each semantic unit and summarize it.
core_audience_attributes:
Think about the core audience for the book. Please define a set of addressable attributes that they are likely to fall under, such as:
- age
- gender
- income gt $100K. These are just examples, use your judgment and i magination, as long as the attributes can feasibly be used to identify core readers.
